title: Linux addr2line Command with Practical Examples
description: Explore the addr2line command in Linux, a powerful tool for resolving addresses to function names and source file locations. Learn its basic syntax, options, and practical use cases.

meta.title: Linux addr2line Command with Practical Examples
meta.description: Explore the addr2line command in Linux, a powerful tool for resolving addresses to function names and source file locations. Learn its basic syntax, options, and practical use cases.
meta.keywords: addr2line, Linux, debugging, function names, source file locations, command line utilities

steps.title: Understand the Purpose of addr2line Command

verify.name: Verify the usage of addr2line command
verify.hint: The output of the `addr2line` command should include the file name and line number associated with the provided address. Please check your command and output.

steps.title: Explore the Basic Syntax and Options of addr2line

verify.name: Verify the usage of addr2line with options
verify.hint: The output of the `addr2line` command should include the function name and the file name and line number associated with the provided addresses. Please check your command and output.

steps.title: Resolve Addresses to Function Names and Source File Locations

verify.name: Verify the usage of addr2line to resolve addresses
verify.hint: The output of the `addr2line` command should include the function names and the file name and line numbers associated with the provided addresses. Please check your command and output.
